item.description: BitBucket #source-code-repo #repo #git Bitbucket is a Git based source code repository hosting service owned by Atlassian. Bitbucket offers both commercial plans and free accounts with an unlimited number of private repositories.

Codecommit #source-code-repo #repo #git #aws Codecommit is a Git based source code repository hosting service owned by AWS. It integrates well with the Codestar group of AWSservices such as AWS Codepipeline, AWS Codebuild, etc.

GitHub #git #CICD #source-code-repo #repo GitHub, Inc. is an Internet hosting service for software development and version control using Git. It provides the distributed version control of Git plus access control, bug tracking, software feature requests, task management, continuous integration, and wikis for every project.
GitLab #git #CICD #source-code-repo #repo GitLab Inc. is an open-core company that operates GitLab, a DevOps software package which can develop, secure, and operate software.
